languages.text: "Сложите оружие, и я обещаю судить вас со всей справедливостью".

traits.locale_text: "Сложите оружие, и я обещаю судить вас со всей спаведливостью".

languages.text: "Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."
languages.original_text: "Сложите оружие, и я обещаю судить вас со всей справедливостью".

traits.locale_text: "Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."
"Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."
"Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."
"Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."
"Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."
"Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."

languages.text: «Deponed las armas y prometo que seréis juzgados con imparcialidad».
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."

traits.locale_text: «Deponed las armas y prometo que seréis juzgados con imparcialidad».

languages.text: “放下武器，我保证会公正地审判你们。”
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."

traits.locale_text: “放下武器，我保证会公正地审判你们。”

languages.text: « Si vous déposez vos armes, je promets de vous juger avec impartialité. »
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous déposez vos armes, je promets de vous juger avec impartialité. »

languages.text: 「武器を捨てろ。そうすれば公正に裁くと約束する」
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."

traits.locale_text: 「武器を捨てろ。そうすれば公正に裁くと約束する」

languages.text: "Legt Eure Waffen nieder, und ich verspreche, gerecht über Euch zu urteilen."
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."

traits.locale_text: "Legt Eure Waffen nieder, und ich verspreche, gerecht über Euch zu urteilen."

languages.text: "Silahlarınızı indirirseniz sizleri adil bir şekilde yargılayacağıma söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons, and I promise to judge you fairly."

traits.locale_text: "Silahlarınızı indirirseniz sizleri adil bir şekilde yargılayacağıma söz veriyorum."
